original_title: Voltaire and Rousseau - Then and Now
overview: In 2012 a group of us made a short documentary about Voltaire and Rousseau, a second hand book shop in Glasgow. We were introduced to Eddie and Ian McGonigle and heard about them, the shop, the proposed development on their lane and their hopes and thoughts for the future. Ten years later we visit them again to see how things have changed and how things have stayed the same.
title: Voltaire and Rousseau - Then and Now
